biography.placeOfBirth: Unrevealed location in the 20th Century United States

work.occupation: (current) Adventurer, (former) freedom fighter, United States government agent, mercenary, combat instructor for X-Force
work.base: The Xavier Institute, Salem Center, Westchester County, New York

connections.groupAffiliation: X-Force, (former) X-Men, Clan Askani, Clan Chosen, Six Pack (formerly Wild Pack II)
connections.relatives: Scott Summers (Cyclops, father), Madelyne Pryor-Summers (Goblin Queen, mother, deceased), Jean Grey (Phoenix, stepmother), Alexander Summers (Havok, uncle), Christopher Summers (Corsair, paternal grandfather), Katherine Anne Summers (paternal grandmother, deceased), Philip Summers (great-grandfather), Deborah Summers (great-grandmother), Jenskot (Aliya, wife, deceased), Tyler (Genesis, son, deceased), Stryfe (clone, deceased), Gabriel Summers (Vulcan, uncle)
